searchByTitle:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the exercise search bar
**UI Location**: Student Exercise List page, within the search input field
**When Users See This**: When the search input field is empty
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Search by title"
noExercisesFound:
**Functional Purpose**: Message displayed when no exercises match the current filters or search criteria
**UI Location**: Student Exercise List page, in the main content area below the filters
**When Users See This**: After applying filters or search criteria that yield no results
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "No exercises found"
